TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDsaCng extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa
Public NotInheritable Class ECDsaCng Inherits ECDsa
public ref class ECDsaCng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::ECDsa

summary.span: 提供椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类派生抽象基类。This class derives from the abstract base class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来签署一条消息以及如何使用该签名来验证消息未被修改。The following example shows how to use the class to sign a message and how to use the signature to verify that the message has not been altered. [!code-csharp[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/vb/program.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用随机密钥对初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a random key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 随机密钥对具有 521 位的公钥长度。The random key pair has a public key length of 521 bits.

exception.span: 此系统不支持下一代加密技术 (CNG) 类。

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes are not supported on this system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必须验证 (即，它必须返回`true`) 时传递给方法，并且必须已命名或显式素数。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method and must be either a named or explicit prime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性接受以下算法： ， ， ， ，和。This property accepts the following algorithms: , , , , and . 此外可以使用其他自定义哈希算法。Other custom hash algorithms may also be used. 默认的算法是。The default algorithm is . 如果要签名或验证已进行哈希处理的数据，则不使用此属性。This property is not used if you are signing or verifying data that is already hashed.

span.span: The value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parameters`仅包含、 只导入的公共密钥。If `parameters` contains only , only a public key is imported. 如果`parameters`还包含，导入完整密钥对。If `parameters` also contains , a full key pair is imported. 字段指定要导入的曲线类型。The field specifies the type of the curve to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将生成用于指定数据的签名的哈希处理输入的数据使用属性，然后对结果进行签名。This method generates a signature for the specified data by hashing the input data using the property, and then signing the result. 标志是必需的如果下一代加密技术 (CNG) 密钥不随机生成的对象。The flag is required if the Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key is not randomly generated by the object.
